ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.5_0: 81. The training rule on what is expired
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.3_0: had gathered a group of senior monks, intending to give the full admission to a trainee nun. But after seeing much staple and non-staple food, she dismissed the senior monks, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.4_0: “Venerables, I won’t give the full admission to the trainee nun just yet.” She then gathered Devadatta, Kokālika, Kaṭamodakatissaka, Khaṇḍadeviyāputta, and Samuddadatta, and gave the full admission to that trainee nun.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.5_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.6_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to a trainee nun, when the given consent had expired?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.10_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.11_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.12_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.13.1_0: ‘If, when any given consent has expired, a nun gives the full admission to a trainee nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.5_0: When any given consent has expired:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.8_0: one training for two years in the six rules.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.11_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.12_0: for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.13_0: and the last announcement is made by two announcements.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.14_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.15_0: while the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.2_0: if she gives her the full admission while the gathering has not yet left;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.5_0: The eleventh rule, the training rule on eleventh day, is finished.
